# Intellica

> Intellica is a global Data & AI company founded in 2006 in Istanbul, Turkey. We empower enterprises to generate sustainable value from data through modern data platforms, analytics solutions, and production-grade AI systems. Active in 20+ countries with 450+ expert professionals and 200+ enterprise projects delivered across banking, telecom, insurance, retail, and government sectors.

## Pages

- [Home](https://intellica-tech.github.io/): Main landing page — capabilities, global impact, products, AI solutions, methodology
- [Products](https://intellica-tech.github.io/products): Licensed product ecosystem — 9 proprietary products across data models, governance, and AI
- [Solutions](https://intellica-tech.github.io/solutions): Enterprise data & AI solutions, services, and AI portfolio
- [About](https://intellica-tech.github.io/about): Company background, values, timeline since 2006
- [Contact](https://intellica-tech.github.io/contact): Contact information and inquiry form

## Products

### Data Models
- **IFDM** (Intellica Finance Data Model): International standard data warehouse model for the finance industry — pre-modeled for regulatory reporting, risk, CRM
- **ITDM** (Intellica Telecom Data Model): Industry-specific data warehouse model for telecom operators — network, billing, CRM dimensioning
- **HRDM** (Human Resources Data Model): Data warehouse model optimized for HR processes — workforce analytics, payroll, talent management

### Data Platform & Governance
- **ICC** (Intellica Consistency Controller): Central data consistency management, reconciliation, and quality control platform
- **ReTouch**: Data entry management platform that validates and imports external data with approval workflows and audit trails
- **Retable AI**: Cloud-based, collaborative no-code data and application development platform

### AI Products
- **Talk To**: AI data analyst — natural language to SQL for enterprise data, generating instant insights without coding
- **BlueOctopus**: AI-powered centralized analytics and surveillance platform for critical data monitoring
- **VAR** (Voice AI Recognition): AI-powered voice signature creation, speaker matching, and identity extraction

## Key Capabilities
- Modern Data Platforms & DWH Modernization
- BI & Advanced Analytics
- AI & Machine Learning (GenAI, LLM, Agentic AI)
- Data Governance & Quality
- Data Integration & Operations
- Consulting & Managed Services

## AI Solutions Portfolio
- Conversational & Copilot AI (Talk To Your Data, Customer 360)
- Predictive & Causal Modeling (Price Prediction, Demand Forecasting)
- Knowledge Automation (Enterprise Document AI with RAG)
- Operational & Agentic AI (AI Defect Solver, Predictive Maintenance)

## Company Facts
- Founded: 2006, Istanbul, Turkey
- Employees: 450+ expert professionals
- Countries: 20+ active delivery
- Projects: 200+ enterprise-scale
- Clients: 100+ enterprise clients
- Growth: 40% year-over-year
